page.original:
SQL::Connection::GetConnectDialogScript() Syntax Script as C = .GetConnectDialogScript( API_Name as C ) ArgumentDescription ScriptAn Xdialog script. A SQL::Connection object. API_NameThe name of a database API.
Description The GetConnectDialogScript() method retrieves the API specific XDialog syntax for the dialog to prompt for a connection string. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if ui_msg_box("Default Connect Dialog Script", conn.GetConnectDialogScript("access")) conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
